jdbcService.sql: select distinct * from ~actions a join ~action_roles ar on ar.action_id = a.id join ~nodes n on n.id = a.owner_id join ~group_roles gr on gr.role_id = ar.role_id and (gr.node_id is null or gr.node_id = a.owner_id) join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = gr.group_id where a.name = 'user.list' and ug.user_id = any(:userIds)
